Col: Bethels letter to His Excellence the Lord Fairfax, concerning the surrender of Scarbrough Castle, on Tuesday, Decemb. 19. 1648. Together, with a true copy of the articles for the rendition thereof, and the result of the Councell of War concerning the same. Bethel, Hugh.
8 p.
Printed for J. Playford at his shop in the Inner-Temple, London : Decemb. 25. 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Col: Bethels letter to His Excellence the Lord Fairfax, concerning the surrender of Scarbrough Castle, on Tuesday, Decemb. 19. 1648. Together, with a true copy of the articles for the rendition thereof, and the result of the Councell of War concerning the same. Bethel, Hugh.
8 p.
Printed for J. Playford at his shop in the Inner-Temple, London : Decemb. 25. 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
J. Playford
his shop in the Inner-Temple
